docs.text: Documentation WingChecker is a VSTO Excel Add-in written in C#. The add-in is designed to check the line lengths on paragliders, providing valuable insights for quality control and safety check. Overview Check out the following contents: Manual for production Manual for checkers Release notes About: Licensing Contributing
docs.title: Home

docs.text: WingChecker is a VSTO Excel Add-in written in C#. The add-in is designed to check the line lengths on paragliders, providing valuable insights for quality control and safety check.
